original_text:
Is it any pleasure to the Almighty if you are in the right,
    or is it gain to him if you make your ways blameless?
korean_text: 네가 의로운들 전능자에게 무슨 기쁨이 있겠으며 네 행위가 온전한들 그에게 무슨 이익이 되겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Is it any pleasure to the Almighty
if you are in the right
or is it gain to him
if you make your ways blameless
